page.title: 11Local Events
page.content: Moreton Say School Fete is normally held in June.It is held on the school field unless it rains when it is held indoors.There is fancy dress,rifle shooting,play area,raffle,stalls and other activities.Sports Day is held in June or July with events for children and parents.The school won a Dolphin Swimming Trophy in 1984 which was presented in 1985 by Keith Chegwin from B.B.C. television. Every year a Church Fete is held in the Rectory garden.The money made is in aid of the church.In September the Harvest Festival Service is held in Church followed by the Harvest Supper and Sale of Produce in the Clive Memorial Church House.At Christmas is the Carol Service. Barn dances are sometimes held in barns to raise money for clubs and charities.
